How very rude. Came to the forum asking for help here and there and didn't have the decency of introduction myself first.

Hello everybody. Name's Berstarke. I'm a student of game design and think that the absolute best way of starting off is with a text-adventure, since it require only text and code (even though you do can add other assets, later). I know quest for quite a while, but only recently I decided to actually engage in mastering the tool. You see, this friend has an online game. Due to reasons beyond his capacity, he had to stop developing new features for it for quite a while. Only that now he's finally finishing what he had to do and is ready to return making the game. I am working on this little game which pays an affectionate parody of his works, since he's very into texting adventures, having said a few times that Infocom's Trinity was one of his favorite games of all time.
